title: Eligibility Verification Service
description:
**Implement EDI 270/271 Eligibility Verification Service**

Build a service that orchestrates the complete workflow for verifying patient insurance eligibility using EDI 270 (eligibility inquiry) and 271 (eligibility response) transaction sets.

**Requirements:**

**Core Functionality:**
- Accept eligibility verification requests with patient and insurance information
- Generate properly formatted EDI 270 transactions according to HIPAA standards
- Send 270 requests to appropriate payer/clearinghouse endpoints
- Receive and parse EDI 271 response transactions
- Extract and normalize eligibility data from 271 responses
- Return structured eligibility results to requesting systems

**Data Handling:**
- Validate required patient demographics (name, DOB, member ID)
- Validate insurance payer information and routing
- Map internal data models to EDI segment requirements
- Handle multiple insurance types (primary, secondary, tertiary)
- Parse complex 271 response loops (subscriber, dependent, benefit information)

**Error Handling & Edge Cases:**
- Handle malformed or rejected 271 responses
- Manage timeout scenarios for delayed payer responses
- Process partial eligibility responses
- Handle "subscriber not found" or "invalid member ID" scenarios
- Log transaction pairs (270 request + 271 response) for audit trail

**Integration:**
- Support multiple transmission methods (direct payer, clearinghouse)
- Implement retry logic for failed transmissions
- Store transaction history with correlation IDs
- Provide status tracking for asynchronous verification requests

**Compliance & Standards:**
- Adhere to HIPAA 5010 version specifications
- Implement proper segment delimiters and control numbers
- Generate valid ISA/GS/ST headers and trailers
- Handle trading partner-specific requirements if needed

**Success Criteria:**
- Successfully submit 270 transactions to payer systems
- Correctly parse and extract all eligibility data from 271 responses
- Maintain audit trail of all transactions
- Return results in consistent, usable format for downstream systems
